text: Hiryū (), meaning "Flying Dragon" may refer to: *Japanese aircraft carrier Hiryū *Mitsubishi Ki-67 Hiryū, Japanese Army bomber *Strider Hiryu, a ninja- like video game character *Flying Dragon, a video game series known as Hiryu no Ken in Japan *Trademark of Yomeishu that is the most traditional Japanese medical liquor. The trademark was given by the shōgun Ieyasu Tokugawa. ==See also== * Flying Dragon (disambiguation)
title: Hiryu
